index.title: Hello world!
index.lead:
Software developer with 6 years of experience in web development, working on both backend and frontend (fullstack).

An enthusiast in various areas of information technology and in solving complex problems, I bring over a decade of strategic market and corporate environment insight to create solutions that make a difference.

Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, I maintain a collaborative approach, valuing teamwork as the foundation for achieving high-impact results.

With advanced English skills, I am prepared to work on global projects and connect innovative ideas to real market needs.

Always seeking challenges, I believe that every line of code is an opportunity to learn, grow, and contribute to a more efficient and connected future. ðŸš€

card_01.title: Jr Full Stack Developer
card_01.bullet01: Solving level 2 problems at legacy code (PHP, JS, CSS, HTML)
card_01.bullet02: Adding new features to legacy code

card_02.title: Front-end Developer
card_02.bullet01: Developing skins/templates for the client's website
card_02.bullet02: Front-end development of web pages based on UX/design boards

card_01.bullet02: Led my team to develop an app to help small business owners deal with daily routine tasks

card_02.bullet02: Led my team to develop a blog focused on physical and mental health
